meanings.sent1: I prefer to eat crudos like sushi and sashimi.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served a variety of crudos, including oysters and ceviche.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the guests were hesitant to try the crudos, thinking they were too exotic.
meanings.sent4: The chef's specialty was preparing crudos that were like works of art on a plate.
meanings.sent5: The freshness of the crudos made a lasting impression on the diners.

meanings.sent1: The artist used crudos like wood and clay to create his sculptures.
meanings.sent2: The factory received a shipment of crudos to be used in manufacturing.
meanings.sent3: The children used the crudos in their art class to make unique creations.
meanings.sent4: The crudos of the earth, like minerals and ores, are essential for many industries.
meanings.sent5: The builder selected high-quality crudos for the construction project.

meanings.sent1: The team consisted of crudos who needed training to improve their skills.
meanings.sent2: The company hired crudos for entry-level positions to gain experience.
meanings.sent3: The crudos in the group were eager to learn and grow in their roles.
meanings.sent4: The mentor took the crudos under his wing to guide them in their development.
meanings.sent5: The workshop aimed to provide support and guidance for the crudos in the industry.
